attributes.additional_details: Protecting ALL STAFF IN SCHOOLS WHO ARE STILL TEACHING VULNERABLE/ FRONTLINE WORKERS PUPILS.
attributes.background:
Recognise that school staff are at risk just as much as frontline/care staff.
Vaccinate ALL SCHOOL STAFF WORKING IN SCHOOLS WITH THE CHILDREN OF FRONTLINE STAFF DESERVE TO BE TREATED AS FRONTLINE STAFF AND BE VACCINATED AGAINST COVID19

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
